name: project-vault
description: ``` project-vault/ ├── package.json          # Electron Config ├── electron-main.js      # The "Brain" of Electron (starts Python) ├── /src │   ├── /ui               # React/HTML/CSS code (Frontend) │   └── /backend          # Python code (Backend) │       ├── main.py       # FastAPI/Flask entry point │       ├── database.py   # SQLite logic │       └── requirements.txt └── /dist                 # Where the final .exe will live ```
